row.field: en
WeChat 4.3 for iPhone Release
Web Grab allows you to pull images straight from your computer browser to your phone.

>WeChat is the complete mobile communication and social networking app. Free, cross-platform, and full-featured, WeChat is the best way to keep in touch with everyone you care about. It supports 15 languages including English, Chinese, Thai, Vietnamese, Indonesian, and Portuguese.

a:4:{i:0;s:167:"1.Introduced Web Grab, a new feature allowing you to pull images straight from your computer browser to your phone. (Visit http://www.wechat.com/shake to learn more) .";i:1;s:38:"2.Sync your Moments photos to Twitter.";i:2;s:77:"3.Download photos from your Facebook albums and share them on WeChat Moments.";i:3;s:29:"4.Download special emoticons.";}
zh_TW
WeChat 4.3 for iPhone 全新發佈
WeChat, 超過一億人使用的手機社交App。實踐免費語音短訊、影片、文字、相片分享及交友的All-in-One App 。
新增搖一搖傳圖,可以將電腦網頁上的圖片“搖”到手機上。

a:4:{i:0;s:167:"1.新增搖一搖傳圖，你可以將電腦網頁上的圖片“搖”到手機上，讓好友也搖到你的圖片。（查看詳情http://www.wechat.com/shake）。";i:1;s:90:"2.可以將朋友圈的相片同步到Twitter，讓更多朋友分享你的快樂一刻。";i:2;s:61:"3.可以從Facebook相簿下載相片並分享到朋友圈。";i:3;s:29:"4.可以下載動畫表情。";}
en
WeChat 4.2 for iPhone Release

WeChat is the complete mobile communication and social networking app. Free, cross-platform, and full-featured, WeChat is the best way to keep in touch with everyone you care about. It supports 15 languages including English, Chinese, Thai, Vietnamese, Indonesian, and Portuguese.
WeChat 4.2 for iPhone has been released. Download WeChat in App Store to experience video calls and web WeChat on your handset

a:4:{i:0;s:49:"1.Video Calls: talk to your friends face to face.";i:1;s:62:"2.Web WeChat: chat on WeChat from your PC through the browser.";i:2;s:151:"3.Selective sharing of Moments using Visibility and custom-defined groups and the ability to reply directly to a friend’s comment in Moments using @.";i:3;s:19:"4.New QR Name Card.";}
zh_TW
WeChat 4.2 for iPhone 全新發佈
超過一億人使用的手機社交App。實踐免費語音短訊、影片、文字、相片分享及交友的All-in-One App 。
新增視訊通話功能
a:4:{i:0;s:56:"1.新增視訊通話功能，遠距離不再是問題。";i:1;s:71:"2.新增WeChat網頁版，電腦連接WeChat，輸入文字更方便。";i:2;s:132:"3.朋友圈上傳相片可選擇分享對象 ，加強朋友圈私隱保護；回覆某條相片評論，讓交流更直接明確。";i:3;s:53:"4.全新的WeChat名片設計，讓你更具魅力。";}
en
WeChat 4.3 for Android Release
Web Grab allows you to pull images straight from your computer browser to your phone.

>WeChat is the complete mobile communication and social networking app. Free, cross-platform, and full-featured, WeChat is the best way to keep in touch with everyone you care about. It supports 15 languages including English, Chinese, Thai, Vietnamese, Indonesian, and Portuguese.

a:4:{i:0;s:167:"1.Introduced Web Grab, a new feature allowing you to pull images straight from your computer browser to your phone. (Visit http://www.wechat.com/shake to learn more) .";i:1;s:38:"2.Sync your Moments photos to Twitter.";i:2;s:77:"3.Download photos from your Facebook albums and share them on WeChat Moments.";i:3;s:29:"4.Download special emoticons.";}

新增搖一搖傳圖,可以將電腦網頁上的圖片“搖”到手機上。

a:4:{i:0;s:167:"1.新增搖一搖傳圖，你可以將電腦網頁上的圖片“搖”到手機上，讓好友也搖到你的圖片。（查看詳情http://www.wechat.com/shake）。";i:1;s:90:"2.可以將朋友圈的相片同步到Twitter，讓更多朋友分享你的快樂一刻。";i:2;s:61:"3.可以從Facebook相簿下載相片並分享到朋友圈。";i:3;s:29:"4.可以下載動畫表情。";}

WeChat 4.2 for Android Release

WeChat is the complete mobile communication and social networking app. Free, cross-platform, and full-featured, WeChat is the best way to keep in touch with everyone you care about. It supports 15 languages including English, Chinese, Thai, Vietnamese, Indonesian, and Portuguese.
WeChat 4.2 for Android has been released. Download WeChat in App Store to experience video calls and web WeChat on your handset
